Author: Jazzy1312
Text: My parents are under the impression that I no longer own laxatives and in order to keep them thinking it, I think my crazy brain chooses to b/p around when they're out. However, if I've eaten something or binged, I also just say that I can't digest certain foods and they usually believe that, but sometimes they're suspicious - which is really annoying. I get mega aggravated by people's concern - Idk if this is something that others experience?
